tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Pat is one of the best professors at Harvard University. She is brilliant, insightful, and kind. I have never worked with a professor who cared so deeply about her students, held them to such high yet achievable standards, and was so willing to offer her time to a struggling student. She has my highest possible recommendation. Take her class!

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: It was hard to get a grasp of her grading policy. She gives several assignments that do not count towards your final grade to give you an idea of where you are in the class. She gives good feedback but it is unclear on what she wants when she grades the final project. We\'re shocked by final grades that are low even after following her criteria.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Although it was a difficult class with significant work load, I found her to be approachable, thoughtful in her feedback, and constructive.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Risky, flaky, and inconsistent feedback! Multiple students were given positive feedback and then blindsided with low grades. After full support over 5 weeks and three meetings on my project, instructor changed her mind and decided she did not like my thesis (that she had approved) and had me restart a semester-long project 3 days before due date.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: An amazing professor--ignore other comments! She\'s tough-minded, and will hold you to high standards (so if you\'re looking for an easy ride, this is not your class), but is absolutely dedicated. You will learn, and remember what you learned.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Be warned--she doesn\'t take criticism well at all and her grading methods, while strict, are extremely subjective. Take a different professor if you can because doing good work won\'t necessarily get you a passing grade.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Not a good communicator and not approachable. Terrible academic! She should find a different career & do the students a favor.
